entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 p.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
